state_description: This screen prompts the user to quit certain applications to proceed with cleaning privacy-related items. The user is informed that quitting these applications will allow the app to clean all related items effectively.

enables.name: Quit Safari
enables.description: Quits the Safari application to proceed with cleaning its related items.

enables.name: Ignore
enables.description: Ignores the prompt and does not quit any applications, potentially skipping the cleaning of related items.

enables.name: Quit All
enables.description: Quits all listed applications to proceed with cleaning all related items.
